about_the_game:
Phantom Matrix is a theatrical, physics-based puzzle VR game.
Armed with your wits and the dual magnetic pistols, it’s time to save your friends.

This demo is made for Steam Next Fest October 2022.
It will have the first two to three levels and skip the cutscenes and some of content that will be available in the official version.
We would like to get feedback from players to help us make the game better, so feel free to leave your comments and suggestions to the demo in the steam community.
